attributes.title: its so trash and it gave me a virus
DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!⚠️⚠️⚠️
attributes.review: firstly, this app took literal DAYS to download. it sat on the home screen of my phone for TWO WHOLE WEEKS before it decided to download. when i eventually went into the app, almost my entire screen showed this horrifying, demonic, nightmare inducing monster that was a bright orange color. it had the scariest fast and i’m scared that children will be scarred by just this. i’ve been having nightmares ever since i saw that image and it’s making my so paranoid! the monster will chase me around my neighborhood with the cops behind them, shooting rubber bullets and throwing tear gas at me! not only that, but i’ve come down with multiple illnesses after downloading this app that may be life threatening! i’m contracted homophobia, transphobia pedophilia, sexism and racism among many many other things. all of the teens around me seem to be offending me more often than usual as well and i don’t know what to do! maybe it’s just me but are there any other people who had the same experience? please someone give me answers!

attributes.title: Trump supporters r poopy👩‍🚀
attributes.review: I have gotten the app and it’s poopy😼 all the trumpy poop🧏🏻‍♂️ supporters scare me and give me diarrhea💀 even the half eaten wrinkly racist Cheeto man gives me bad vibes🧠  I aura checked the app... and it’s cursed🧚🏻 I advise you to manifest the energy to get rid of trumpy poops 💩 and manifest the energy to get rid of the wrinkly Cheeto mans supporters”

attributes.title: Bird poop in my coffee is better than this app
attributes.review: Honesty the app is horrible, it drains my battery and eats up all my storage. Also the information on it is a lie and it keeps trying to get me to buy orange self tanner.

attributes.title: I’m left with nothing 😭😭😭😭🥺
attributes.review: I downloaded this app with the expectations of having a good place to support our ✨wonderful✨ president but as soon as I opened it everything went dark and I was blinded by an orange light coming from my phone. My crops died, water dried up, and my dog went missing 😡😡😡 I’d give this a -1000000 star rate if I could but 1 will have to do🧚🏻‍♂️🤚 deleting immediately❤️
